languages.text: "Боюсь, мы оба позволили себе смешать долг и чувства. И я не отступлю — полагаю, как и вы".
"I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, мы оба позволили себе смешать долг и чувства. И я не отступлю — полагаю, как и вы".

traits.locale_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
"I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
"I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
"I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
"I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

languages.text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben uns erlaubt, Pflicht und Gefühl zu vermischen. Ich werde nicht klein beigeben, und Ihr wohl auch nicht."
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich fürchte, wir haben uns erlaubt, Pflicht und Gefühl zu vermischen. Ich werde nicht klein beigeben, und Ihr wohl auch nicht."

languages.text: « Je crains que nous nous soyons tous deux permis de mélanger travail et sentiment. Je ne renoncerai pas, et vous non plus, je présume. »
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

traits.locale_text: « Je crains que nous nous soyons tous deux permis de mélanger travail et sentiment. Je ne renoncerai pas, et vous non plus, je présume. »

languages.text: «Me temo que ambos hemos mezclado el deber y nuestros sentimientos. No pienso retroceder, e imagino que usted tampoco».
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

traits.locale_text: «Me temo que ambos hemos mezclado el deber y nuestros sentimientos. No pienso retroceder, e imagino que usted tampoco».

languages.text: 「私たち二人は、義務と感情を混同してしまったようだ。私は決して引き下がらない。お前もだろう？」
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

traits.locale_text: 「私たち二人は、義務と感情を混同してしまったようだ。私は決して引き下がらない。お前もだろう？」

languages.text: “恐怕我们两个都把责任与感情混淆在一起了。我是不会让开的，我猜你恐怕也不会。”
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕我们两个都把责任与感情混淆在一起了。我是不会让开的，我猜你恐怕也不会。”

languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."

languages.text: "Korkarım ki ikimiz de vazifelerimizle duygularımızın karışmasına göz yumduk. Ben geri adım atmayacağım. Sanırım sen de atmayacaksın."
languages.original_text: "I fear we have both allowed ourselves to mix duty and sentiment. I will not back down — and I suppose neither will you."
